title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: As the campus in the new age, it is necessary to get to know the world outside. We will work and live in the society in the future. We must know the things from society. Only do this we will become a suitabe funder of our country. We can get to know the world outside the campus in some way, Such as the public , society sevese , paper , TV ect . From this, we can know some more useful things for our work in the future. We can not only live the university, we must go out to study widly . I will be in society after one month. I am going to do a job in society. To do this I can study some experiese for my work in the future. In other way, I will read some books about the world outside the campus and some paper, such as the China Daily, the Qingdao Daily ect . I am going to tiried to be a suitable man in the future job.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: The fact is clearer and clearer that the college students must get to know the world outside the campus. Today, we live in a highly developing world. The science and technology is constantly changing day after day. If we just stay at school and read our limit books we should not keep up with the time. There are many ways we can know of the society. The most convinient is the public media, we can read the newspaper, listen to the radio, etc. Social service is also a way we can know the world, we use our special technology to work for the society. Through communication with all kinds people we will know the world well. I should try my best to know the outside world. I will put myself in the outside world and become a member in it. Using my advantages to work for the society and developing all kinds of ability, in this way, can I become a qualified college graduate.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: For most students of the universities, it is essential to get to know of the world outside the campus. With the social development, the faster the social pace, the greater the knowledge of society we need, so that we must get to know the world. Which way can we know of the world by? There are many ways to be done. First, we can know by the media, and the media is the most common of all and best. Second, we can go out of campus to make any social service for people, by thus , we can get knowledge increasingly. Of course, there're many other ways to be adopted. As a student of university I intend to do some home teaching in my spare time, and to find some social jobs to do on holidays. In addition, I'll take an active part in actions organized by my department or university ,etc.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: It is necessary for college students to know about the world outside the campus. The pure knowledge from books is not adequate. From a survey, former college students have little ability to adapt to our society. So they have contributed less to the society than expected. In order to know the world outside the campus, there are many means by which we can practise. The most important one is through mass media. For example, we can know about the incidents which have happened in the world and issues through newspapers and televisions. So that our thoughts can keep the step with the development of our society. Besides, we can know about the world around us through our services to the society. In this way, we will touch all kinds of people and we will have more experience. All these will lay a good foundation after we graduate from school. To know more information about the world, I think I should form the good habbit of reading newspapers and watching programs of news on TV. At the same time, I will be more active in committee services. And put the knowledge I've learned from books into practice. I think only in this way can I be more useful to our society.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus

title: Practice Makes Perfect

In 1960, the life expectancy was about 40-year-old , however, it was about 60-year-old in 1990. The average age has improved about 20-year-old . And, the infant mortality has greatly declined. In 1960, the infant mortality was 20 percent, but in 1990, it has declined to 10 percent. According to above total , we can infer some reason of causing these changes. First, the life's level of the developing countries' people has already improved. Second, the technology of science has greatly advanced, so that the infant mortality declined. Third, the people's culture level make them know how to keep themselves' body healthy. In a words , health gains in developing countries which is because of the developing economy and technology.

title: Global shortage of Fresh Water
text: Most people usually tend to think that fresh water can never be used up, especially when they consider the fact that we can obtain fresh water from such resources as rainfall , river flowing and well water . Those resources can be seen almost everywhere. However in fact , fresh water is in a critic shortage, nowadays. With the dramatically increasing of population and the amount of industry using water, more fresh water is used everyday. And pullotion of the water have reduced the water available greatly. Hence something must be done to avoid the future disasters that the shortage of fresh water would bring to us. Every individual must use water facianally . And laws must be passed to oblidge the factories from wasting and polluting water. Only in this way can our situations be improved.

title: Global shortage of Fresh Water
text: Nowadays people usually think that fresh water in the earth will be plentiful for ever. Many people argue that there are so many rivers and wells in the world that human beings may have a plenty of fresh water to use. Moreover, it rains a lot in a year. So it makes up for the used fresh water. But in fact, the problem of fresh water shortage is becoming more and more serious today. There are many reasons for the problem. Firstly, overpopullation has caused the fact that there are more and more people who will need much fresh water year by year. Secondly, the need of fresh water in industry is increasing. Thirdly, pollutions have caused that a lot of fresh water can't be used by human beings. In a word, our world is facing the problem of water shortage. Many measures should be taken to solve this problem. We can turn sea water into fresh water by scientific means. And we should use water economically in our everyday lives.

But in fact fresh water is very limited. With the development of industry factories are using more and more fresh water. The water used by the resident is also increasing because of the increasing of the population. In addition the industrial waste water is let out into the rivers, polluting fresh water. So our human beings are facing a serious problem-- the shortage of fresh water. What should we do about it? I think we should build up the people's consciousness of saving water. Because it is everyone's duty, not only a few people's duty. What's more we should try our best to avoid more serious pollution. Remember this: Fresh water is the source of our lives!

But , in fact, we are very short of fresh water. Porpulation increases very fastly . More and more people need more and more fresh water. Morden industrial develops much quickly. Its need of fresh water is increase , too. unfortunately , plenty of fresh water is polluted. It becomes useless. So fresh water shortage becomes a global problem. What can we do? First, I think, we must save the fresh water. Second, we must protect our surroundings and prevent fresh water from pollution. Finally, we can make the polluted fresh water clean again. It can be used in industrial . I think, if we realize the problem and do something about it, we can overcome fresh water shortage.

There are many different ways for us to know society for examples , reading newspapers, watching TV, listening to radio are all effective methods, besides, it is a important way to take part in social activities. We can get what we can't learn from booktexts . As a college student , we mean to know the would outside the campus to develop my ability. I'll take part in some social activities, for example I'll apply for a teaching post in my summer holiday , in addition I'll read more books and newspapers to know society's demand.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: It is necessary that all the college students learn about the world outside the campus. There are two reason at least. For one thing, we can catch up the times and know the latest news of every sides of society. For another. As a university student , when we will gradulate from school we must service this society. So the more we learn about the world outside, the better we will service people. There are many ways to learn about the society for us. First, we can do it by public medium such as newspapers, magazines broadcasting and so on. Second, we can take part in all kinds society department and communicate experiment . Finally we also can do it by ourselves on holidays. As far as I am concerned, I shall read newspapers as many as posible on usual . And I plan to practice it on this summer holidays in order to learn about the world outside campus by myself.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: It is quite necessary for us college students to know the world outside the campus. For one thing, even though we are now living in the campus, we are also been affected on by it . title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: Today, it is necessary for college students to learn about the society. As a college student, I want to know about the society, too. According to my situation, I hope I can take part in the activities of society as a tutor.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: As a college student, our task is study, but it is not enough. In order to keep up with the times, we should get to know the world outside the campus. There are many advantages of it . title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: This is a rapid-developing world. It is necessary for us college students to get to know the world outside the campus. A great part of our time is spent in school, to some extent, the world outside is strange to us. As the future builder of our nation, we should know the things around us. Only we know the world, we could change the world. To know the world, there are many ways as a student , we could read newspaper everyday. we could listen to the radio to know the incidents happened in and outside our nation. We can also take part in the exercise which is organized by the school such as the investigation of the society, the exhibition. We are sure to learn something about the socity from these actions, of course, there are students who get down to business, this is also a good way of knowing the world. To my opinion home-teaching is the best way for us to make money. I had little knowledge in society, I will try my best to grasp every chance to practise myself I will attend the activities with great care. I will learn from my classmates who does well in this . I hope I can be a suitable builder and devote myself to the nation.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: It is very important for collegers to know the society. After over ten years' study, we know little from the socity . We are only familiar with our campus and families. title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: It is necessary for college students to know about the society. After graduating from campus, they will enter the society, which is quite different from university. title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: It's important for us college students to go outside to know the society. Because, we only work hard in the class, but we don't know how to pratise it ; we only know the knowledge in the textbook, but we don't know the news, the latest technology of science in the world. As for me, I think I can be a special teaching assistant during terms and on holidays, I'll watch TV, go to the factories, visit the country etc. In a word, I'll try my best to learn the society.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: As a university student , we should concentrate on our society. Because when we finish our four-years studying , most of us will begin to work. If we don't know about it, how can we make much in our work. Fortunately, with the development of the society we can learn the society through plenty of ways. A good case in point is that we may read newspapers every day. Of course, if possible, you also can listen the radio or watch TV. For us students, a straight way to get information of the society is to go into the society in person. For example, you might visit some factories, or go down the countries. In such ways, I believe that you can attain much information. I will read newspapers that I can get my hand on. I have a radio, therefore I can get much information on it. Time permitting, I will go out of the campus and come into the society.

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: It is very necessary for us students to know much about our society. If you don't know about it, you will be at a loss when you graduated . title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus

title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: We college students must get to know the world outside the campus. The recent world becomes very complex. If we don't understand it, we'll find it difficult to adapt it after we graduate. In order to devote ourselves to our country, we must have a good idea of our country. Getting to know the world outside the campus makes our eyes open . title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: To a college students , it's necessary to get to know the world outside the campus. If we can know the world well, we'll understand the importance of knowlege and why we must study hard. title: Getting to Know the World Outside the Campus
text: It's importand and necessary for college students to get to know the world outside the campus. Living in school makes us know little about our society. Therefore, we should learn about our social development in order to be suitable for our society. By doing so, we could benefit our country more. There are many ways in learning about our society. One important way is public mediation , such as television, broadcasting and newspapers. Another way is social service. We can perform some service plans so as to learn about our society by practising. Besides these, there are also some other ways to get to know the world outside the campus. As far as I am concerned, I will keep myself well-informed about the outside world. I will learn about the social development in all kinds of ways. Sometimes I'll keep connect with our society through practising.
